//   ---------------------------- ----- ----

//   DNEMiscParameter             c11      1
//   DNEResolution                c12      1
//   LightColorAndFalloffExponent c13      1
//   ShadowBufferAndTexelSize     c14      1
//   ShadowOverrideFactor         c15      1
//   ShadowWarpFunctionTexture    s0       1
//   ShadowDepthTexture           s1       1
//

    ps_3_0
    def c1, 1, 0.5, 0, 0.0399999991
    def c2, 2954.63867, 2047.9989, 2, 0.125
    def c3, -5.55472994, -6.98316002, 0.200000003, 0
    dcl_texcoord4_pp v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord5 v1.xyz
    dcl_texcoord6 v2
    dcl_texcoord7 v3.w
    dcl vPos.xy
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15

    dp3_pp r0.x, v2, v2
    rsq_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mad_sat_pp r0.y, c11.x, v3.w, c11.y
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, c0.x
    nrm_pp r1.xyz, v0
    mad_pp r0.xzw, v2.xyyz, r0.x, r1.xyyz
    nrm_pp r2.xyz, r0.xzww
    texld_pp r3, c1, s0
    dp3 r0.x, v1, v1
    add r0.z, -r0.x, c1.x
    mul r4, r3.x, r0.z
    mov r5, r4
    texkill r5
    if b0
      mad r0.zw, vPos.xyxy, c12.xyxy, c12
      mul r0.zw, r0, v3.w
      mul r5, r0.w, c8

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --only-autofixed --git --quiet CRC32_D5CB204B_0.txt
add r10.w, v2.w, -r10.y
mad r0.z, -r10.w, r10.x, r0.z

      mad r5, c7, r0.z, r5
      mad r5, c9, v2.w, r5
      mad r5, c10, v3.w, r5
      rcp r0.z, r5.w
      mul r3.yz, r0.z, r5.xxyw
      texld r6, r3.yzzw, s1
      mov r4.xz, c1
      mad r7, c14.wwzw, r4.zxxz, r3.yzyz
      texld r8, r7, s1
      texld r7, r7.zwzw, s1
      mad r0.zw, r5.xyxy, r0.z, c14
      texld r9, r0.zwzw, s1
      mov r6.y, r8.x
      mov r6.z, r7.x
      mov r6.w, r9.x
      add r5, r5.z, -r6
      cmp r6, r5, c1.z, c1.x
      mul r0.zw, r3.xyyz, c14.xyxy
      frc r0.zw, r0
      cmp r3.yz, r5.xxyw, -c1.z, -c1.x
      add r3.yz, r3, r6.xzww
      mad r3.yz, r0.z, r3, r6.xxyw
      lrp r1.w, r0.w, r3.z, r3.y
      mul r0.z, r1.w, c15.x
      mul_pp r3.yzw, r0.z, r3.x
    else
      mov_pp r3.yzw, r3.x
    endif
    mov r0.w, c1.w
    mad_pp r4.xyz, c5.w, r0.w, c5
    mov_sat r0.x, r0.x
    add r0.x, -r0.x, c1.x
    pow_sat_pp r5.x, r0.x, c13.w
    mov r5.y, c1.y
    texld_pp r5, r5, s0
    mov_sat_pp r0.x, r1.z
    mul_pp r0.z, r0.x, c0.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.w, r5.x, c0.y
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, r0.w
    mov_sat_pp r1.w, r2.z
    mul_pp r2.w, r0.w, c2.x
    mad_pp r0.w, r0.w, c2.y, c2.z
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, c2.w
    mad r1.w, r2.w, r1.w, -r2.w
    exp_pp r1.w, r1.w
    mul_pp r0.w, r0.w, r1.w
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.x, r0.w
    mul_pp r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    dp3_sat_pp r0.y, r1, r2
    mad_pp r0.w, r0.y, c3.x, c3.y
    mul_pp r0.y, r0.y, r0.w
    exp_pp r0.y, r0.y
    lrp_pp r1.xyz, r0.y, c1.x, r4
    mul_pp r0.xyw, r0.x, r1.xyzz
    mad_pp r0.xyz, c4, r0.z, r0.xyww
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r3.yzww, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r5.x, r0
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c13
    mov_pp r0.w, c3.z
    cmp oC0, -r4.w, c1.z, r0

// approximately 85 instruction slots used (6 texture, 79 arithmetic)
